title: Cookie Clicker
description: Click cookies to build your cookie empire! Start with simple clicking and unlock upgrades, buildings, and achievements in this addictive idle game.
instructions: Click the big cookie to earn cookies. Buy upgrades and buildings to automate production.
controls: Mouse/Touch - Click the cookie and navigate menus

description: Combine tiles with the same numbers to reach the 2048 tile! A simple yet addictive puzzle game that tests your strategy and planning skills.
instructions: Use arrow keys or swipe to move tiles. Combine matching numbers to create larger numbers.

title: Retro Bowl
description: Manage your football team and lead them to victory! A retro-style American football game with team management, drafting, and strategic gameplay.
instructions: Control your player, pass, and manage your team through seasons.
controls: WASD/Arrow keys for movement, mouse for passing
tips: Upgrade your stadium for more fans

title: Slope
description: Navigate a ball through an endless 3D course filled with obstacles! Test your reflexes and precision in this fast-paced arcade game.
instructions: Control the ball's direction and avoid obstacles while maintaining speed.

title: Poly Track
description: Race through geometric tracks in this minimalist racing game! Simple controls, challenging tracks, and satisfying gameplay.
instructions: Drive through checkpoints while avoiding obstacles and maintaining speed.
controls: AD or Left/Right arrows for steering

title: Bitlife
description: Live a virtual life from birth to death! Make choices that affect your character's life, career, relationships, and legacy.
instructions: Make life choices through various scenarios and random events.
controls: Click through life events and make choices

title: Drive Mad
description: Navigate challenging obstacle courses with various vehicles! Physics-based driving with tricky terrain and objectives.
instructions: Drive through challenging levels while keeping your vehicle upright.
controls: AD or Left/Right arrows for movement

title: Monkey Mart
description: Build and manage your own supermarket as a monkey! Plant, harvest, and sell goods to expand your business empire.
instructions: Plant seeds, harvest crops, and manage your store to maximize profits.
controls: Click to plant, harvest, and manage inventory

title: Fireboy and Watergirl 1: Forest Temple
description: Control two characters with different abilities to solve puzzles! Work together to overcome obstacles and reach the exit.
instructions: Control Fireboy (red) and Watergirl (blue) simultaneously or switch between them.
controls: Arrow keys for Fireboy, WASD for Watergirl
tips: Fireboy avoids water, Watergirl avoids fire

title: Bob the Robber 4
description: Help Bob steal from the rich in this stealth adventure! Sneak past guards, hack security systems, and collect valuable items.
instructions: Move silently, avoid detection, and complete objectives in each level.
controls: Arrow keys for movement, space to interact

title: Raft Wars
description: Defend your treasure from pirates and other threats! Use physics-based weapons to knock enemies off their rafts.
instructions: Aim and shoot at enemies while managing your raft's position and resources.
controls: Mouse to aim and shoot, arrow keys to move

title: Basketball Legends
description: Play as basketball stars in intense matches! Use special moves and power-ups in this fast-paced sports game.
instructions: Dribble, shoot, and use special abilities to outscore your opponent.
controls: WASD for movement, space for special moves

title: Tomb Of The Mask
description: Navigate through an endless vertical labyrinth! Collect masks and coins while avoiding deadly traps and enemies.
instructions: Move through the maze, collect items, and avoid obstacles in this fast-paced adventure.
controls: Swipe in the direction you want to move

title: Basket Bros
description: Play fast-paced basketball matches with friends in this multiplayer sports game. Team up and compete in exciting basketball action.
instructions: Control your player, shoot hoops, and work with teammates to score.
controls: WASD for movement, mouse to aim and shoot

title: Slope 2
description: Navigate a ball through a 3D course filled with obstacles in this thrilling endless runner game.
instructions: Roll the ball down the slope, avoid obstacles, and collect points.
controls: Arrow keys or mouse to steer

title: Traffic Escape
description: Solve puzzles by maneuvering cars out of traffic jams in this strategic puzzle game.
instructions: Move cars to clear a path for the target vehicle to escape.
controls: Click and drag cars to move them

title: Super Star Car
description: Race through tracks and perform stunts in this high-speed car racing game.
instructions: Drive your car, collect stars, and reach the finish line.
controls: Arrow keys for acceleration and steering

title: Stickman Climb 2
description: Help the stickman climb challenging obstacles in this physics-based platformer.
instructions: Climb walls, avoid hazards, and reach the top.
controls: Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump

title: Basket Random
description: Enjoy chaotic basketball matches with random physics in this fun sports game.
instructions: Play basketball with unpredictable physics and score points.
